PHRASE.LANG: kName
Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Waitress Shirt
Chemise noire et grise de serveuse du Scorpio's de Sodium
Schwarz und graues Sodium-Scorpio's Kellnerinnen-Hemd
Camicia da cameriera dello Scorpio's di Sodium nera e grigia
Camisa de camarera negra y gris de Scorpio’s en Sodium
Scorpio'sウェイトレスシャツ(ブラック)
Sodium Scorpio's 흑/회색 웨이트리스 셔츠(여성)
Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Waitress Shirt (Women)
Sodium Scorpio's 灰黑色侍應生上衣（女用）
Sodium Scorpio's 灰黑色服務生上衣（女用）
Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Waitress Shirt
kDesc
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Skirt Waitress Skirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez cette chemise avec la jupe noire et grise de serveuse pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit dem schwarz und grauen Kellnerinnen-Rock, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossala insieme alla gonna da cameriera nera e grigia mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínala con la falda de camarera negra y gris mientras trabajas en Scorpio's para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 셔츠를 흑/회색 웨이트리스 치마와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Skirt Waitress Skirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與灰黑色侍應生裙，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與灰黑色服務生裙，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Skirt Waitress Skirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
